Mine. Apparently hV missiles are really effective at close range. 1 to snap them off, 1 to kill the fighter. got 2 back. Prophit?

http://www./?3fda4549ij70083

Edited October 15, 2013 by zekes

Bravo tank took two shots and managed to take out Vicotry Over Death's [sic] conning tower. I think it might be disabled?

Persist:

http://www./?e1y3i3yiubqgfuw

Hey, spartwo, finally did that light cruiser... 51 tons w/o tanks, 86 with Long Endurance Tanks (LET). 2 Armor Peircing missiles, 2 HV missiles. Good SAS power, good range (900 stock/1800 with LETs).

Built with Drek Armor, so she is pretty strong, also has great engine-out flyability (almost unnoticeable yaw).

AND it's only 230 parts (W/O tanks)

Stock:

With LETs:

(Spartwo, I think we can do that Ike battle now. 3 Bayonets Vs 3 Drek 15-2s?

Edited October 15, 2013 by zekes

Bravo tank took two shots and managed to take out Vicotry Over Death's [sic] conning tower. I think it might be disabled?

I just tested it and Victory over Death is still alive. Her Captain is KIA but her automated probe is her real computer.

If you want I can let you keep going on your attack sense you still have two more missiles on Bravo. If not I ll take my turn
Go ahead and take your turn.

Go ahead and take your turn.

Ok except its 11pm here in Auburn Al so I ll take it tomorrow before my class

Solace 3 was given the green light to engage.

Target: Armstrong Tank Bravo

Lieutenant Calfry Kerman got into position

Shot 1 missed

Shot 2 missed

but shot 3....

...was right on the money

Solace 3 was then ordered to land due to being out of missiles

(note this was the first time I ever got the flag to line up just right on the first try)

As for Bravo

its not dead yet but it will be a chore to roll it back over

Spartwo, I think we can do that Ike battle now. 3 Bayonets Vs 3 Drek 15-2s?

No I'm still working on a mk4.Those weapons look familiar.

It's more of a chore to keep it from rolling over too far. Reaction wheels make the tanks ideal for low gravity.

True. true.

When should I expect your next move?

Edit: Last turn, I dislodged the middle torpedo and some bits behind it on Victory Over Death, including an RC controller. How did it get fixed?

Idk how that happened

In my battle with Spartwo some armor that I know got blown off was reattached when Spartwo played his turn. My only thought is that if it was quick saved that may have done it. Other than that it's just a glitch

But I ll take your word for it and (if it's still attached let alone alive when I take my next turn I ll ditch the SRB missile)
